column1: Little Goat Diner////Went here before a Hawks game for lunch. The food was all very good! I loved that the restaurant had a diner feel but with food that was better than diner food. I ordered a cheeseburger
column2: fries and a chocolate shake. It did not disappoint. The only downside was my boyfriend left feeling sick and had pretty bad food poisoning. However
column3: he would go back and so would I
column4: that speaks for how good the food was!
